title: Just had a fresh level 30 try to pick Azir in their first Ranked match
body:
"But I'm comfortable on him"

-checks match history-

1 bot match, 3 ARAMs over the course of a few months.  Why do people do this?

EDIT: Just rechecked his op.gg to see the game I dodged.  Yeah he fed....hard.  ROFL
